title: 7.2 bugged
body:
SO SINCE GETTING 7.2, MY GAME HAS STARTED DISCONNECTING IN GAME EARLY, AND WONT ALLOW ME TO  RECONNECT, I HAVE TRIED SEVERAL TIMES TO RECONNECT TO THE GAMES (HAS HAPPENED LAST NIGHT AND FIRST GAME THIS MORNING) BUT TO  NO AVAIL, I AM CURRENTLY POSTING THIS WHILE RECONNECT IS TRYING IN CLIENT, HAS A POP UP TELLING ME CHECK CONNECTION, CONNECTION IS FINE, PLEASE ADVISE ON HOW I CAN FIX THIS BECAUSE IF I GET BANNED FOR ANOTHER RIOT BUG, I WILL CEASE TO PLAY THIS GAME AND ADVISE OTHERS TO DO SO::


UPDATE: JUST GOT A F**KING LEAVER BUSTER AGAIN FOR A PROBLEM WITH YOUR TECH...

NOT F***ING HAPPY AT ALL
